quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: Welcome <name>, to Gwynedd Valley! To start the game, go talk to Cindy in St. Bernard's

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Hi <name>, I'm Cindy, I'm the head of the Robotics Research Lab, and I have a quest for you. I've recently acquired a new AI module for our research project, but it needs a power source to get started. There's a specialized battery located down the hall in the equipment storage room. Retrieve the battery and bring it back to me so we can activate the AI module.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Sure, Cindy! I'll head over to the equipment storage room right away and get the battery for you.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Wow, there's a lot of stuff in here. Now, where could that specialized battery be?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: I found the battery! I should go take it to Cindy...

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Excellent, <name>! Let's install it and see how our new AI module performs. Thank you for your help!

quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: It looks like Howard needs your help... you can also find him in St. Bernard's

quests.speaker: Howard
quests.dialog: <name>, I need your assistance. We're in a bit of a bind. The thumb drive containing the program we've been working on seems to have gone missing. I need you to retrieve it from the laboratory storage room as soon as possible.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Of course, Howard! I'll head to the laboratory storage room right away and find the thumb drive for you.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Wow, I never realized how much I enjoy being the go-to person for help until Howard asked me to find that thumb drive.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Found it! I'll bring it to you immediately.
quests.quest_name: Take the thumb drive to Howard

quests.speaker: Howard
quests.dialog: Excellent work, <name>! This program is crucial for the robot dog’s programming. Thank you for your quick action in retrieving it.

quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: It looks like Cindy needs your help again...

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: <name>!, I need your help controlling the dog, it’s not responding to commands! Quickly, I need you to retrieve a translation book from the library. The directions are in Mandarin.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Alright, Cindy! I'll head to the library right away and find the translation book for you.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Entering the library to find the translation book, I couldn't help but wonder: amidst the rows of shelves, where would I find it?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Found it! Now, back to Cindy's office.

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Fantastic! You found the book. Give the book to Howard so he can use it to program the robot dog.

quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: Someone new needs your help! Go meet Greg in St. Bernard's.

quests.speaker: Greg
quests.dialog: Hey <name>,I'm Greg, a full-time professor for the Computer Science department. I need you to help me build a drone from our Arduino kits. Find four of the parts scattered around the building and bring them to me.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Sure thing, Gregg! I'll start searching for the parts right away.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: where should I start looking for the parts first?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: I found all the drone parts! I need to take them to Greg ASAP.

quests.speaker: Greg
quests.dialog: <name>, Griffin, thanks for your help. Please place the assembled drone on the desk for testing.
quests.quest_name: Put the drone on Greg's Desk

quests.speaker: Greg
quests.dialog: <name>, I also need your help programming the drone to follow a specific flight path and capture aerial footage of our test site. I'll provide you with the coordinates and flight parameters.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Understood, Greg. I'll get started on programming the drone right away.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Who would of thought programming would be this hard?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: It's all set, Greg. The program is uploaded, and the drone is ready for its test flight.

quests.speaker: Greg
quests.dialog: Excellent job, Griffin! The drone is performing exactly as planned. Your programming skills are truly impressive.

quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: Looks like Cindy is having an emergency! Go help her.
quests.quest_name: Go see what Cindy's emergency is

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: <name>, we have a bit of an emergency. My robot dog has somehow managed to run away from the lab. We need to find it quickly before it gets lost. Can you help us?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Of course, Cindy! I'll do everything I can to locate the robot dog. Do you have any idea where it might have gone?

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Not exactly, but I remember seeing it head towards the park earlier. We'll need Greg's drone to help us search the area efficiently.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: I'll reach out to Greg right away and get the drone ready for the search.

quests.speaker: Greg
quests.dialog: The drone's camera is live. We'll cover as much ground as possible to maximize our chances of finding the robot dog.

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Now lets find the robot dog!

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Thank you both so much for your help! I don't know what I would have done without you.
quests.quest_name: Bring the robot dog to Cindy

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: <name>, I need your assistance once again. I've managed to retrieve the robot dog, but it needs some programming adjustments from Howard. Can you take it to him?

quests.speaker: <name>
quests.dialog: Of course, Cindy! I'll make sure the robot dog gets to Howard for the necessary programming tweaks.

quests.speaker: Howard
quests.dialog: Perfect timing, Griffin! I'll take care of it right away. Thank you for bringing it over.

quests.speaker: Howard
quests.dialog: All set, Griffin! The robot dog should be ready to go. Please let Cindy know.
quests.quest_name: Bring the dog back to Cindy

quests.speaker: Cindy
quests.dialog: Excellent job <name>, The dog is working properly and can't wait to use it to grab me coffee!

quests.speaker: Narrator
quests.dialog: Looks like the story has come to its conclusion. We hope you had a great time at Gwynedd Valley and come back again soon!
